resources.string: Top row buttons shows the permissions required. Buttons to launch the tools occupy rest of the area. The Stop (red) Button is at the bottom right corner.
Click the permission buttons to grant the permission. Once it is granted the button will turn green!

Tap the button to launch a floating toggle on the screenâ€™s edge. You can drag it anywhere. Tap the toggle to use the tool or perform the action. Active toggles turn their buttons red. Calculator and Notepad save your work automatically. Launching the screenshot toggle will prompt you to give media projection permission. More usage info and functionality of the toggles can be found below.

IMPORTANT: For Notepad and Sticky Notes, tap the check button after typing to exit edit mode.
To stop a toggle, tap its button again or drag it to the bottom of the screen. You can also use the Stop button to close all toggles. Mirror and Sticky Notes have their own close buttons.

Mute: Mutes and restores media volume.
Brightness: Reduces and restores brightness.
Alert Toggle: Toggles between Ring, Vibrate and Silent modes.
DND: Toggles DND mode on and off.
Font Size: Maximizes and restores the system font size.
Timer: Tap to start/stop, long press to reset. Allows custom time.
Stopwatch: Tap to start/stop, long press to reset.
Screen On: Prevents screen from dimming when active.
Mirror: Uses front camera to feed to function as a mirror.
Flashlight: Turns phone flashlight on and off.
Calculator: Opens and closes a basic floating calculator.
Notepad: Opens and closes floating notepad.
Sticky Notes: Launches new sticky note to the screen.
Screenshot: Takes a screenshot.
